author: George_Legoman
title: The famous old brother..
review:
And so it began..!!

After Lego's attempts with Promotional MAERSK boats, this is actually the first complete Truck/Lorry with one of the two Semi trailers, way too big to fit to any other theme list at the time.

The result though is what is left in our childhood dreams: The Ultimate Truck/Lorry Lego set for all vehicles lovers. 

It’s a league on its own set, determining the Era in which vehicles still use stickers for headlights instead of the latter released set (1552), using Transparent headlights 1x1 plates.

All the parts for both the short and the long containers are made in the beloved Old (light) Grey colour. Special and really rare parts:

  • Old Light Grey Windows 1x6x5.
  • Old Light Grey Window 1x3x5 Shutters.
  • Old Light Grey Bricks 1x3x5.
  • Maersk Blue Doors (Left & Right) 1x3x2.
  • Maersk Blue Old Minifig Accessory Construction Helmet, Headgear.
  • Eventually, all Maersk and Old Light Grey coloured parts..

And of course, the legendary sticker sheet Sticker for Set 1651-2 - (190775)..

I only wish they had even more ideas like this one at those days..
